title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 330.5 - Conduct of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 330.5 - Conduct of hearing

State Regulations

The Psychology Practice Committee conducting a hearing
shall not be bound by common law or statutory rules of evidence, or by
technical or formal rules of procedure, except as provided in this Subchapter, but may make such investigation or inquiry, or conduct such hearing, in such
manner as it deems advisable and necessary. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
330.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
